title: Bênçãos Que Não Têm Fim (Counting My Blessings)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Ainda me lembro quando um milagre eu pedi
lines.translation: I still remember when I asked for a miracle.
lines.grammar: Verbs: lembro, quando. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I still remember when I asked for a miracle.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Com pouca fé, sim, eu temi
lines.translation: With little faith, yes, I was afraid.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: com (with). Meaning: 'With little faith, yes, I was afraid.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E hoje eu posso ver, foi muito além do meu pensar
lines.translation: And today I can see, it went far beyond what I had imagined.
lines.grammar: Verbs: posso, ver, muito. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'And today I can see, it went far beyond what I had imagined.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.translation: There are so many blessings to recount.
lines.grammar: Verbs: são, tantas, contar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'There are so many blessings to recount.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.
Verbs: dois. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'One two three'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Blessings that never end.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

Verbs: perco, contas. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I lose count.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E agradeço o que fez por mim
lines.translation: And I appreciate what you did for me.
lines.grammar: Verbs: agradeço. Prepositions/case: por (cause/path). Meaning: 'And I appreciate what you did for me.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.translation: God, I have so many blessings.
lines.grammar: Verbs: tenho, tantas. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'God, I have so many blessings.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.translation: I can see in my life
lines.grammar: Verbs: posso, enxergar. Prepositions/case: em + article contracts (no/na/nos/nas). Meaning: 'I can see in my life'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.translation: The more I see the details
lines.grammar: Verbs: quanto, mais, vejo. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'The more I see the details'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

Verbs: posso, encontrar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I can find your kindness'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.translation: Father, and as long as I live
lines.grammar: Verbs: enquanto, viver. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Father, and as long as I live'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

Verbs: irei, lembrar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I will always remember.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

Verbs: sejam, infinitas. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Even though they are infinite'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

Verbs: suas, irei, contar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I will count your blessings.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E nenhuma fase dura para sempre
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: para (purpose/direction). Meaning: 'And no phase lasts forever.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Por isso, eu não vou me esquecer
lines.grammar: Verbs: isso, vou, esquecer. Prepositions/case: por (cause/path). Meaning: 'That's why I won't forget.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Cada motivo que tenho pra ser grato
lines.translation: Every reason I have to be grateful.
lines.grammar: Verbs: motivo, tenho, ser. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Every reason I have to be grateful.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Por ter sido tão fiel a mim
lines.translation: For being so loyal to me.
lines.grammar: Verbs: ter, sido, tão. Prepositions/case: por (cause/path); a + article contracts (ao/à). Meaning: 'For being so loyal to me.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.
